author: markt
msg: Check if socket is closed before trying to write a message to it.
Also, flush any partial buffered data before closing the socket.

author: solomax
msg: Release: dist-release target corrected to create "well named" release artifacts

author: markt
msg: Control messages can be sent in the middle of a fragmented message.
